item.description:
As a group of over 40 singles, we really don't need a reason to enjoy a night out. I've been wanting to try the Angry Olive, a new restaurant in Rocky Hill, CT. It's gotten rave reviews, has a pretty decent wine/drink list, and looks like a cool place!

I have reserved our own room in the restaurant, and the reservation is under Caryn/Meetup Group. My cell is 860-328-1778. Hope to see you there!


Angry Olive Italian Bistro


1625 Silas Deane Highway
5 Waterchase Drive
Rocky Hill, CT 06067
860-257-8402

Check out their website for menus, wine/drink list, dessert (yum) list and pricing.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Angry Olive Bistro Dinner Party
